WorkItem.Description:
Tring to work out gear selections in RAWR Bear I noticed that the LW enchants for wrists were not included.
 
I can only assume that this means that other profession specific enchants and bonus' are also not included.
 
Ones that would be useful to include are:
Skinning Crit Rating
Mining Health
 
Leatherworking wrist enchants
Tailoring Cloak Enchants
Blacksmithing Bonus Sockets
Engineering item enchants
Inscription Shoulder Enchants
